All Classes

  • Class Description
    Bullet
    Projectile fired by hostile entities
    BulletDispenser
    Stores and handles firing of patterns
    DebugCircle
    Draws a circle debug
    DebugDraw
    Draws debug shapes
    DebugLine
    Draws a line debug
    DebugRect
    Draw a debug rectangle
    Entity
    Class for interactive gameObjects
    FireStation
    Static friendly Entity.
    FireTruck
    Controlled by the player.
    FireTruckSelectionScene
    Window for selecting FireTruck type
    Fortress
    Static hostile Entity.
    GameObject
    Basic object for all displayable objects
    GameOverScreen  
    GameScreen
    Contains the main game logic
    GameScreen.GameScreenState  
    GameTextures
    Stores textures for classes to reference.
    HUD
    HUD window
    Kroy
    Main game class
    MenuScreen
    Main Menu screen
    MenuScreen.MenuScreenState
    Used to define the current state of the screen, MAINMENU is used mostly but then TRUCKSELECT used when the "NewGame" button has been pressed
    OptionsWindow
    Options window
    OptionsWindow.State
    Allows to have multiple 'pages' of the Option window without having to create several stages.
    Pattern
    Stores patterns of bullets to fire
    PauseWindow
    Pause window
    StatBar
    Sprites used to display statistics for the player
    TiledGameMap  
    TileType  
    UFO
    Mobile hostile entity.
    WaterStream
    Sprite used to represent where the player is shooting
